### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Wooden Chest Storage at position(x=56.5 y=0.5)

- Wooden chest at position(x=61.5 y=0.5)

### Belt Group at position(x=-16.5 y=-51.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=-16.5 y=-51.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY

### Belt Group at position(x=-12.5 y=-47.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=-12.5 y=-47.5) with status EntityStatus.EMPTY

### Furnace at position(x=-10.0 y=-49.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=-10.0 y=-49.0) which is out of fuel

### Drill 1 at unknown position
Consists of Drill 1 which is out of fuel

### Drill 2 at unknown position
Consists of Drill 2 which is out of fuel

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when furnace is out of fuel
- Ensure the furnace has a sufficient fuel source before attempting to use it
### Errors when drills are out of fuel
- Ensure drills have a sufficient fuel source before attempting to use them
### Errors when furnace has not produced iron plates
- Check the furnace's input and output to ensure it is correctly configured for iron plate production
### Errors when belt group is empty
- Ensure the belt group is properly connected to a power source and has a sufficient supply of items to transport

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
